name: com.github.d3tonat0r.postprocessingurp
description:
Provides a post processing render feature that allows for easy integration of custom post processing effects and also includes common post processing effects missing from the default universal render pipeline.

Effects included in this package:

▪ Auto Exposure
▪ Blur (Box & Gaussian)
▪ Brightness/Gamma Adjustments
▪ Image Compression
▪ Dithering
▪ Edge Bleed
▪ Invert Colors
▪ Outline
▪ Pixelate
▪ Texture Overlay
▪ World Space Texture
